title: Love is Blind The Pod Squad Necklace
body_html:
Celebrate the unforgettable connection made in the pods with the Love is Blind "Pod Squad" Text Pendant Necklace. Crafted from high-quality, recycled sterling silver and plated with radiant 24k yellow gold, this sleek and modern necklace is perfect for fans who want to show their dedication to the Love is Blind experience. The minimalist text pendant proudly displays "Pod Squad," making it a stylish statement of loyalty to the cast who found love behind the walls. Whether you're part of the squad or just cheering them on, this piece is a must-have for true fans.

  • This product is: metal 3D printed Hallmarked 925 Sterling silver made of 100% recycled Silver. Comes with an adjustable anchor chain 17.7" to 19.7" (450mm-500mm) from 925 sterling silver, planet-friendly, hypoallergenic, and skin-friendly (nickel free).
  • Should be kept dry at all times, avoid wearing while swimming, sleeping, bathing or sweating. If the jewelry is in contact with sea water, rinse with freshwater and dry immediately. Avoid exposure to high temperatures and direct contact with solvents, perfume or cosmetics.
